markdownRemark.html:
The title is play on words which reflect two of my biggest passions - computer science and food.

  • It could mean this or this.
  • Or it could mean this  - warning: I’m particularly intrigued by the gastronomical origins of a true Kashmiri Pandit Rogan Josh

frontmatter.title: How to think about web services APIs - REST and SOAP
